title: Wealth Management AI App
description: An intelligent wealth tracker that analyzes your spending, investments, and financial goals in real time using AI-driven insights.
highlights: Built a full-stack wealth management platform with real-time portfolio tracking and expense analytics.
Integrated live stock market APIs for on-the-fly portfolio valuation updates.
Developed an AI financial advisor to detect spending inefficiencies and recommend savings/investment actions.
Designed visual dashboards and analytics charts for goal progression and wealth history.
Cloud-hosted backend using AWS Lambda and DynamoDB, optimized for scalable serverless compute.
results: Achieved near real-time wealth recalculations using WebSocket streaming.
Reduced user financial inefficiencies by up to 15% through AI-driven detection.
Enabled predictive insights to accelerate financial goal achievement.
